content.raw:
The pull request only tried to solve the compilation problem, sorry I didn't test the profile system which probably will take a bit more of time to check if results are correct.

Nate, Claude Lacoursière provided [more information about using the profiler](http://kforge.ros.org/pipermail/gazebo-list/2013-January/004395.html) which I think should be our starting point. 

I will add profile support to my TODO list so we can give it the proper priority.
content.html:
The pull request only tried to solve the compilation problem, sorry I didn't test the profile system which probably will take a bit more of time to check if results are correct.

Nate, Claude Lacoursière provided more information about using the profiler which I think should be our starting point.

I will add profile support to my TODO list so we can give it the proper priority.
